attributes.action: Give Legality to the undocumented people in the UK during this pandemic time
attributes.additional_details:
The undocumented people currently living in the UK are leading a life of humbleness and righteousness. During this Covid-19 Pandemic, giving these people legality will:
- Allow the UK overcome the Employment crisis
- Overcome the aftermath of Brexit
- They will support the UK by paying Taxes and contributing to the UK economy; much needed in this time of Crisis
- By having legal documents or data, the government can monitor them and help stop crime through identification
attributes.background:
1. Give a permanent or temporary legality with terms and conditions to the undocumented people which will benefit the Nation.
2. Become an example to the other Nations for it's humanitarian ground.
3. Arrange a debate or motion about this.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/312998
